    @allure.title("Dynamic Rule Sum Billing Currency - Blocked by Watchlist")
    def test_billing_curr_watchlist(self, txn_samples, fw_api_all, cleanup_smart_rules, cleanup_watchlists):
        # Generate unique test name with timestamp
        UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER = f'bc_rs_b_{self._get_dynamic_velocity_abbrev("Billing Amount (based on Billing Currency)")}'
        TEST_RULE_NAME = f't_{UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER}'
        TEST_WATCHLIST_NAME = f"TWL_{UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER}"
        TEST_THRESHOLD = 5000
        WATCHLIST_IP = "127.5.5.99"
        TEST_EMAIL = 'tc_rs_wl@test.com'
        TEST_COMMENT = 'test automation rule (delete me)'
    
        # Post Test Cleanup
        cleanup_smart_rules.append(TEST_RULE_NAME)
        cleanup_watchlists.append(TEST_WATCHLIST_NAME)
    
        # Navigate to Smart Rules
        side_navbar = SideBarPage(self.driver)
        side_navbar.expand_rules_console()
        with url_change(side_navbar, fail_message="Failed to navigate to Smart Rules."):
            smartrules_page = side_navbar.click_smart_rules()
    
        # Create Dynamic Smart Rule
        create_rule_page = smartrules_page.click_add_new_rule()
        create_rule_page.tick_active_rule_upon_save()
        create_rule_page.enter_name(TEST_RULE_NAME)
        create_rule_page.select_static_condition_field('Email')
        create_rule_page.select_static_condition_opt('Matches')
        create_rule_page.select_static_condition_value('Email:')
        create_rule_page.enter_static_condition_value(TEST_EMAIL)
        create_rule_page.select_decision('block')
        create_rule_page.click_add_dynamic_condition()
        create_rule_page.select_dynamic_cond_velocity_type("Billing Amount (based on Billing Currency)")
        create_rule_page.enter_dynamic_cond_threshold(TEST_THRESHOLD)
        create_rule_page.enter_dynamic_cond_duration(3)  # days
        create_rule_page.select_dynamic_cond_group_by('Email')
        create_rule_page.enter_comments('test automation rule (delete me)')
        smartrules_page = create_rule_page.click_confirm()
    
        # Check Smart Rule
        smartrules_page.enter_rules_filter_name(TEST_RULE_NAME)
        rule = smartrules_page.get_first_rule()
        assert rule.get_name() == TEST_RULE_NAME
    
        # Navigate to Watchlist
        side_navbar = SideBarPage(self.driver)
        side_navbar.expand_rules_console()
        with url_change(side_navbar, fail_message="Failed to navigate to Watchlist"):
            watchlist_page = side_navbar.click_watchlist_rules()
    
        assert watchlist_page.get_page_header() == "Watchlist Rules"
    
        # Create Watchlist
        create_watchlist_form = watchlist_page.click_add_new_watchlist()
        create_watchlist_form.enter_name(TEST_WATCHLIST_NAME)
        create_watchlist_form.select_watchlist_type("IP Address")
        create_watchlist_form.select_value_fieldset_to_edit(1)
        create_watchlist_form.select_value_option("IP Address:")
        create_watchlist_form.enter_value(WATCHLIST_IP)
        create_watchlist_form.select_decision('block')
        create_watchlist_form.enter_comments(TEST_COMMENT)
        watchlist_page = create_watchlist_form.click_confirm()
    
        assert watchlist_page.get_page_header() == "Watchlist Rules"
    
        # Check Watchlist created
        watchlist_page.enter_watchlist_filter_name(TEST_WATCHLIST_NAME)
        watchlist = watchlist_page.get_first_watchlist()
        assert watchlist.get_name() == TEST_WATCHLIST_NAME
        assert watchlist.get_status() == "Inactive"
        assert watchlist.get_decision() == "block"
        # Activate Watchlist
        details_page = watchlist.click_details()
        details_page.click_activate()
        assert details_page.get_status() == "This watchlist is active."
    
        # Send & verify Vanilla transaction
        vanilla_txn = txn_samples.VANILLA
        for _ in range(3):
            vanilla_resp = fw_api_all.send_transaction(vanilla_txn)
            assert_txn_matches_decision(vanilla_resp, 'score', TEST_RULE_NAME)  # vanilla transaction should not be blocked by rule
    
        # Send Test transaction
        krw_transaction = copy.deepcopy(txn_samples.BASE_TEST)
        krw_transaction.update({
            'transaction_id_ext': f'tt_{UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER}',
            'transaction_channel': self.get_random_txn_channel()
        })
        krw_transaction.update({
            "user_email": TEST_EMAIL,
            'billing_currency': "KRW",
            'billing_amt': '1000',
        })
    
        krw_transaction2 = copy.deepcopy(txn_samples.BASE_TEST)
        krw_transaction2.update({
            'transaction_id_ext': f'tt_{UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER}',
            'transaction_channel': self.get_random_txn_channel()
        })
        krw_transaction2.update({
            "user_email": TEST_EMAIL,
            "user_ipv4": WATCHLIST_IP,
            'billing_currency': "KRW",
            'billing_amt': '1000',

        sgd_transaction = copy.deepcopy(txn_samples.BASE_TEST)

            'transaction_id_ext': f'tt_{UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER}',
            'transaction_channel': self.get_random_txn_channel()
        })
        sgd_transaction.update({
            "user_email": TEST_EMAIL,
            'billing_currency': "SGD",
            'billing_amt': '250',
        })
    
        # Based on KRW 5000 threshold
        # First 3 should be scored
        for _ in range(3):
>           assert_txn_matches_decision(fw_api_all.send_transaction(krw_transaction), 'score', TEST_RULE_NAME)
